item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @Unit666 Unit666
item.description:
@Unit666 wrote:

home should be Entrana after starting off at the tutorial island
Dragon Claws (yes)
Every boss monster
Simple shops (not overcrowded with stuff and has to be related)
pk base: safe area in the wild
Economy: should be good (no 10k for killing a lvl 2 man)
any other ideas :
this should probably be posted somewhere else.

Read full topic
